text: Roger I may refer to: :In chronological order * Roger I of Carcassonne (died 1012), Count of Carcassone * Roger I of Tosny (), Norman noble * Roger I "de Berkeley" (died 1093), Norman noble, possibly the son of Roger I of Tosny - see Baron Berkeley * Roger I of Sicily (1031–1101), Norman ruler of Sicily * Roger I Trencavel (died 1150), Viscount of Albi, Carcassonne, and Razès * Roger I of Fézensaguet (1190–1245), Viscount of Fézensaguet
title: Roger I
